free_text.Contenu: - Summary of fundamental optics (ray optics, Maxwell's equations, wave optics and polarization optics)[br/]- Optical beams and Fourier optics[br/]- Optics of crystals[br/]- Stratified media and photonics crystals[br/]- Light scattering[br/]- Optics of metals and plasmonics[br/]- Acousto-optics and electro-optics[br/]- Nonlinear optics[br/]- Optics of metals and photonic crystals
free_text.Prérequis: General knowledge of fundamental optics, e.g. courses Ingénierie Optique I & II
free_text.Objectifs d'apprentissage: This course builds up on knowledge in optics and photonics acquired during the bachelor cycle and develops specific advanced topics of modern optics, with emphasis on applications.
